author: Balakumar K
title: Covid-19: Hospitals see a chance to mainstream telemedicine consultations
description: The corona virus crisis seems just what the doctor ordered plan to enhance the penetration of telemedicine practice especially in Indian rural areas
content:
It took a pandemic as enormous as the Covid-19 one to force the  government to issue guidelines that recognised the practice of telemedicine in India.
